pkgmetadata.longdescription: Almost Linear-Time k-Medoids Clustering // Interface to a high- performance implementation of k-medoids clustering described in Tiwari, Zhang, Mayclin, Thrun, Piech and Shomorony (2020) "BanditPAM: Almost Linear Time k-medoids Clustering via Multi- Armed Bandits" https://proceedings.neurips.cc/paper/2020/file/7 3b817090081cef1bca77232f4532c5d-Paper.pdf.
